price: 29. Mid kastoo ka mid ah (uunka Alle sida Ibliis ama qeyrki) ee yidhaahda: “Waxaan anigu ahay Ilaah la jirkiis Isaga,” kaas oo kale waxaan ku abaal marin Jahannama. Sidaas oo kale baan ku abaal marinnaa daalimiinta.
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman yaqul min'hum innī ilāhun min dūnihi fadhālika najzīhi jahannama kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
